item.title: Sentiment analysis of football fan tweets during a game
item.description: Are Manchester United fans more critical of their team than opposing fans about theirs? This was the (too ambitious) question I intended to answer when I began this piece but having discovered some of the difficulties in accessing bulk, multi-period Twitter data I have scaled it back. I certainly intend to revist the bigger question using Twitter scraping solutions that have since become available, but for now Iâ€™ll restrict myself to the more achievable question:
